'''1.21.6 Pre-Release 2''' (known as '''1.21.6-pre2''' in the launcher) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.6]], released on June 2, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-6-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.21.6 Pre-Release 2|June 2, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* The following sound categories have been renamed:
** <code>Friendly Creatures</code> -> <code>Friendly Mobs</code>
** <code>Hostile Creatures</code> -> <code>Hostile Mobs</code>

=== General ===
'''[[Dialog]]s'''
* Input Control Types
** {{cd|minecraft:text}}
*** Output values:
**** As template substitution: contents with special characters escaped to fit in a [[SNBT]] literal (note: both {{cd|'}} and {{cd|"}} are escaped).
*** For {{cd|multiline}} field:
**** If {{cd|height}} field is omitted, but {{cd|max_lines}} is present, the height that will be chosen to fit the maximum number of lines can't exceed {{cd|512}}.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.6 Pre-Release 2
|;From released versions before 1.21
|217887|Unsigned books written in {{cd|1.9-pre1}} or earlier don't upgrade properly.
|;From 1.21.5
|297591|Ender pearls can unexpectedly come to a halt.
|;dev
|297575|Happy Ghast with nbt NoAI set to true can't be controlled by player.
|298104|The {{cd|max_lines}} field of multiline text input control is unrestricted, lagging the game.
|298144|The initial value of {{cd|minecraft:text}} input type is limited to 32 characters, regardless of {{cd|max_length}} field.
|298155|Dialog {{cd|command_template}} using a multiline text input causes player to be kicked out of the server due to illegal characters in chat (which is {{cd|\n}})
|298209|Player cannot move while touching a happy ghast's body.
|298301|Blinking the cursor shifts all characters to the right of a multilines text field input in Dialogs.
|298307|Entering and exiting a pale garden while in Creative mode causes the current music track to remain silent.
|;prev
|298315|Portals take excessive time to teleport players.
|298358|Riding a mob into powder snow no longer affects the player properly.
|298361|Happy ghast with player riding, teleports back and forth when exiting nether portal.
|298368|{{cd|music_notes.png.mcmeta}} has an extra index that does not exist, causing a warning.
|298394|Freezing in Powdered Snow is very inconsistent and jittery.
|298422|Ghasts and happy ghasts do not take damage from harmful blocks under some circumstances.
}}</onlyinclude>
